net.minecraftforge.server.permission

Enum DefaultPermissionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DefaultPermissionHandler>
      • net.minecraftforge.server.permission.DefaultPermissionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DefaultPermissionHandler>, IPermissionHandler

    public enum DefaultPermissionHandler
extends java.lang.Enum<DefaultPermissionHandler>
implements IPermissionHandler
    Default implementation of PermissionAPI. hasPermission(GameProfile, String, IContext) is based on DefaultPermissionLevel
    See Also:
    IPermissionHandler

      • getDefaultPermissionLevel

        public DefaultPermissionLevel getDefaultPermissionLevel(java.lang.String node)
        Returns:
        The default permission level of a node. If the permission isn't registred, it will return NONE
